title: panic at github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/metadata.go:112: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference

labels.name: Support Contract
labels.description: Issues made for customers with support contracts

body:
<!--

We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

**STOP and READ**
**YOUR POST WILL BE REMOVED IF IT IS LOW QUALITY**:
Please show the effort you've put into solving the problem and please be specific.
People are volunteering their time to help! Low effort posts are not likely to get good answers!

If you think you might have found a bug, try to replicate it with the latest beta (or stable).
The update instructions are available at https://rclone.org/commands/rclone_selfupdate/

If you can still replicate it or just got a question then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

for a quick response instead of filing an issue on this repo.

If nothing else helps, then please fill in the info below which helps us help you.

**DO NOT REDACT** any information except passwords/keys/personal info.

You should use 3 backticks to begin and end your paste to make it readable.

Make sure to include a log obtained with '-vv'.

You can also use '-vv --log-file bug.log' and a service such as https://pastebin.com or https://gist.github.com/

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### The associated forum post URL from `https://forum.rclone.org`

N/A

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

Repeatable crash like this:

```
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal 0xc0000005 code=0x0 addr=0x28 pc=0x7c497a]

goroutine 32662 [running]:
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs.metadataMapper({0x2a69050, 0xc0003203c0}, {0xc0000ca000, 0x14, 0x14}, {0x2a7e870, 0xc0017d9e00}, {0x4bd69a08, 0xc0005517a0}, 0xc0016e9c80)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/metadata.go:112 +0x31a
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs.GetMetadataOptions({0x2a69050, 0xc0003203c0}, {0x2a7e870, 0xc0017d9e00}, {0x4bd69a08, 0xc0005517a0}, {0x0, 0x0, 0x4bd33708?})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/metadata.go:166 +0x1e8
github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/local.(*Object).Update(0xc000a5b320, {0x2a69050, 0xc0003203c0}, {0x4bd69988, 0xc0019102e0}, {0x2a746c0, 0xc0005517a0}, {0x0, 0x0, 0x0})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/local/local.go:1423 +0x8d0
github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/local.(*Fs).Put(0xc0017d9e00, {0x2a69050, 0xc0003203c0}, {0x4bd69988, 0xc0019102e0}, {0x2a746c0, 0xc0005517a0}, {0x0, 0x0, 0x0})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/local/local.go:696 +0xbd
github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/local.(*Fs).PutStream(0x40fabf?, {0x2a69050?, 0xc0003203c0?}, {0x4bd69988?, 0xc0019102e0?}, {0x2a746c0?, 0xc0005517a0?}, {0x0, 0x0, 0x0})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/local/local.go:705 +0x65
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations.Rcat({0x2a69050, 0xc0003203c0}, {0x2a7ecd0, 0xc000340840}, {0xc0001211d0, 0x47}, {0x2a5a670, 0xc001323420}, {0x121eac0, 0xedb86ca95, ...}, ...)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations/operations.go:1359 +0x1003
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations.(*copy).rcat(0xc0011ca2d0, {0x2a69050, 0xc0003203c0}, {0x2a5a670, 0xc001323420})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations/copy.go:183 +0xe9
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations.(*copy).manualCopy(0xc0011ca2d0, {0x2a69050, 0xc0003203c0})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations/copy.go:260 +0x616
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations.(*copy).copy(0xc0011ca2d0, {0x2a69050, 0xc0003203c0})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations/copy.go:302 +0x16c
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations.Copy({0x2a69050, 0xc0003203c0}, {0x2a7ecd0, 0xc000340840}, {0x0, 0x0}, {0xc0001211d0, 0x47}, {0x2a7da70, 0xc000bb90e0})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations/copy.go:404 +0x485
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync.(*syncCopyMove).pairCopyOrMove(0xc000a60288, {0x2a69050, 0xc0003203c0}, 0xc000320320, {0x2a7ecd0, 0xc000340840}, 0x25, 0xc000d2bf60?)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync/sync.go:498 +0x205
created by github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync.(*syncCopyMove).startTransfers in goroutine 1
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync/sync.go:528 +0x6b
```

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

`v1.67.0-beta.7919.df0229245.pr-7789-onedrive`

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)

Windows 2022, 64 bit

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

Google Workspace (source)
OneDrive/SharePoint (target)

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`rclone copy Source: Target:`

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

I'll email logs to the Support address shortly.

<!--- Please keep the note below for others who read your bug report. -->

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
